程序包 net.minecraftforge.client.model

类 ForgeItemModelShaper

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.client.renderer.ItemModelShaper
net.minecraftforge.client.model.ForgeItemModelShaper
public class ForgeItemModelShaper extends ItemModelShaper
Wrapper around ItemModelShaper that cleans up the internal maps to respect ID remapping.
